doc:
Peter Robbins (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Robbins_(actor) 0 Peter Robbins (born Louis Nanasi, August 10, 1956) is an American former child actor, voice actor and real estate broker. Robbins earned national fame in the 1960s as being the first actor to voice Charlie Brown in the Peanuts films and television specials. Robbins left the entertainment industry as an adult, later pursuing a career in real estate and brief stints in radio. Peter_Robbins ( born Louis_Nanasi , August_10_,_1956 ) is an_American_former_child_actor , voice_actor and real_estate_broker . Robbins earned national_fame in the_1960s as being the_first_actor to voice_Charlie_Brown in the_Peanuts_films_and_television_specials . Robbins left the_entertainment_industry as an_adult_,_later_pursuing a_career in real_estate and brief_stints in radio .
